category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: DefaultLoadCount
preference.preference_description: Sets the initial number of objects to load in a page of a result set from a 4GD cacheless search. This number may increase for subsequent pages based on the value of the DefaultLoadCountIncreaseRate preference. Valid Values: Any valid integer. The larger the number, the longer the page takes to load.
